channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines

item.title: Ice chunk from JetBlue plane crashed through couple's ceiling, lawsuit says
item.description: A California couple is suing for $1 million in damages, citing property damage and emotional distress.

item.title: Senate Democrats work to delay speedy confirmation of Trump nominees
item.description: Senate Republicans are trudging through the process to confirm President Trump's nominees as Democrats push back on their speedy approval.

item.description: The Gulf Coast is digging out from a once-in-a-lifetime snowstorm that struck from Texas to Florida, closing airports and crippling roadways.
